availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Waldeck (Hart County, Kentucky, county clerk)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, county clerk. Kentucky native. Son of John Waldeck and Mary A. Waldeck. Resident of Hart County in 1850. Clerk of the Hart County Court from 1860 to 1865.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 266. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District 2, p. 126. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865 (Frankfort, KY: George D. Prentice, 1866), p. 11. Find A Grave, "John Alexander Waldeck (1836-1894)," Memorial #16600755, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=16600755&ref=acom (accessed June 10, 2017).
